mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Almira Lincoln Phelps to Ann Pamela Cunningham, 1861 April 2
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Phelps, Lincoln, Mrs., 1793-1884
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Almira Lincoln Phelps to Ann Pamela Cunningham, April 2, 1861. Baltimore. In looking over list of Vice-Regents, saw none listed for MD. Why? Earlier MVLA had asked her for assistance in this endeavor - she was unable - now however, she offers her services. Feels that more than purchasing Washington's home the MVLA can help bond together women of North and South. Wants to use the Mount Vernon Record to bring "political influence of women more before them."
